name: style_transform
description: Transform a draft answer into a blended style guided by specific prompts (e.g., sartre.md + camus.md, or emerson.md + jefferson.md, or voltaire.md + paine.md).

draft_text.description: Plain, neutral draft response to be stylistically adapted.

styles.description: Set of style prompts to blend. The tool will keep content but adjust framing and voice.

intensity.description: How noticeable the stylistic influence should be.
